welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fort Collins, where the charm of a historic Old Town meets the vibrant energy of a university town. Get ready to explore our scenic trails, craft breweries, and live music scene â€“ we can't wait for you to experience it all!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal Airport is a small but modern facility, offering a range of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no password required for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weld County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Weld County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
